verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: renewed] [ARG1: a threat to close down the federal government] [ARGM-TMP: when current funding runs out in September if immigration reforms and funding for a wall on the U.S. border with Mexico are n’t forthcoming] .

President Donald Trump renewed a threat to [V: close] down [ARG1: the federal government] when current funding runs out in September if immigration reforms and funding for a wall on the U.S. border with Mexico are n’t forthcoming .

President Donald Trump renewed a threat to close down the federal government [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG1: current funding] [V: runs] out [ARGM-TMP: in September] [ARGM-ADV: if immigration reforms and funding for a wall on the U.S. border with Mexico are n’t forthcoming] .

President Donald Trump renewed a threat to close down the federal government when current funding runs out in September if immigration reforms and [V: funding] [ARG1: for a wall on the U.S. border with Mexico] are n’t forthcoming .

President Donald Trump renewed a threat to close down the federal government when current funding runs out in September if [ARG1: immigration reforms and funding for a wall on the U.S. border with Mexico] [V: are] [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [ARG2: forthcoming] .
